name: Bombard
description:
Bombard is a somewhat strategic block-breaking game with elemental balls and blocks, with an upgrade based progression system
The more blocks you destroy, and materials you collect, the bigger and blastier the elemental effects will become.

Features:
- Elemental Balls and Blocks that spawn Lightning Arcs, Fiery Explosions and Chilling Areas.
- Upgrade your health, aiming length, ball count, and ball effects while progressing through the Standard set of levels
- Challenge yourself to an Endless run of progressively beefier Blocks or Levels
- Prime Elemental Blocks with matching Elemental Balls for the biggest Effects
